channel.title: Help with function
channel.description: how do i get scar to generate random strings with integers in them?example plz

item.title: Help with function
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

example

begin
  i:=100000+random(900000)
  writeln(inttostr(i))
end.

so thats the basis, ill break it down more

i:=100000+random(900000)

put this everytime you want to to generate a random number(must have i as a var)
so if you put it at the start of a loop, it will generate a new number everytime it restarts

writeln(inttostr(i))

well this will writeln(in debug box) with you generates varible and…

sendkey(inttostr(i))
or
sendkeysilent(inttostr(i))

sends the generated number to the client…

if you need anything else, let me know
oh and you can modify

i:=100000+random(900000)

inorder to generate more or less digits.

understood?

Read full topic
